title: Analyze Demographics for a Retail Tenant
description: A national coffee chain is considering a new location. Their agent must analyze the demographics of the surrounding area.

tasks.description: Define a 1, 3, and 5-mile radius around the potential site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Geographic rings for the analysis are established.

tasks.description: Pull a demographic report for these radii, including population density, average household income, and daytime population.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed demographic report is generated.

tasks.description: Summarize the findings in a report and compare them to the retailer's ideal customer profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear recommendation on whether the location's demographics match the tenant's requirements.
